text: Kare-ra wa chijō o tabi shite, kare-ra izen no mono no saigo ga dōdeatta ka o kansatsu shinai no ka. Kare-ra wa, korera (makka no tashinkyō to) yori mo yūryokude, chijō ni nokosu iseki ni oite mo sugurete ita. Shikashi arrā wa, kare-ra o tsumi no tame ni torae rareta. Sonotoki arrā kara, kare-ra o mamoreru mono wa hitori mo nakatta
